message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay that price for the product.
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $90. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway. I'll sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit far from $110. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product. Can we meet at this price?
I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to make another compromise. I'll sell it to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit far from $105. I'm willing to pay $98 for the product. Can we meet at this price?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'll meet you halfway between $105 and $98. I'll sell it to you for $101.50.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not comfortable with $101.50. I'm willing to pay $97.50 for the product. Can we meet at this price?
